caption:
A mask made of glass...  Henrik Lundqvist and I have been talking about this passion project for years . How about create the whole mask in a glass look just like old stained glass creations in for example old churches. Now we wanted to finalize the ideas . I made some sketches to Henrik and we brainstormed, we came up with a plan, I started to paint . On a distance it is a clean cut Lundqvist mask, and when you come closer  the design is transformed into a true Storyteller mask . And for sure it is loaded with all the DaveArt Trademark Super FX , among them a lot of glitter FX built into the glass . @hank30nyr @nyrangers #DaveArt #nhl @bauergoalie @nhl @bauerhockey #nhl
 
Repost @davidofdaveart
caption_raw:
A mask made of glass...🎨🥅 Henrik Lundqvist and I have been talking about this passion project for years🗽. How about create the whole mask in a glass look just like old stained glass creations in for example old churches. Now we wanted to finalize the ideas😊. I made some sketches to Henrik and we brainstormed, we came up with a plan, I started to paint🚦🚀. On a distance it is a clean cut Lundqvist mask, and when you come closer🔍 the design is transformed into a true Storyteller mask📕. And for sure it is loaded with all the DaveArt Trademark Super FX💎, among them a lot of glitter FX built into the glass✨. @hank30nyr @nyrangers #DaveArt #nhl @bauergoalie @nhl @bauerhockey #nhl
・・・
Repost @davidofdaveart

caption:
New Raanta #NYR90 mask by @davidofdaveart  
It was a joy to create my friend Antti Raanta's mask for the 3rd jersey of the Rangers . A design in dark blue and red and light brown. Antti knew what he wanted, he wanted to pay tribute to the two legendary Rangers goalies Richter and Giacomin. I loved his ideas. We brainstormed together and we came up with a design plan and I started to paint. I really love to create and paint these Storyteller masks . @nyrangers @nhl #DaveArt #anttiraanta #nhl #richter #giacomin @bauergoalie
caption_raw:
New Raanta #NYR90 mask by @davidofdaveart ・・・
It was a joy to create my friend Antti Raanta's mask for the 3rd jersey of the Rangers🏙. A design in dark blue and red and light brown. Antti knew what he wanted, he wanted to pay tribute to the two legendary Rangers goalies Richter and Giacomin. I loved his ideas. We brainstormed together and we came up with a design plan and I started to paint. I really love to create and paint these Storyteller masks📕😊🎨. @nyrangers @nhl #DaveArt #anttiraanta #nhl #richter #giacomin @bauergoalie

caption:
Antti Raanta continues paying tribute to the heroes of New York City . Antti's previous mask was a tribute to the New York Police Department, we transformed the mask into a NYPD car ... Here is Antti's latest creation...  The mask is transformed into a New York Fire Department truck , it is a tribute to the heroes of the Resque 1 team . I just love to paint and create these Storyteller masks. Use the mask's surface to create the story . I can tell you this, I loved to paint this story . #anttiraanta @nyrangers @nhl #DaveArt #nhl #DaveArtCreativity #nyfd @nyfd9_11 @bauergoalie
 
#Repost @davidofdaveart
caption_raw:
Antti Raanta continues paying tribute to the heroes of New York City💪🏻🏙. Antti's previous mask was a tribute to the New York Police Department, we transformed the mask into a NYPD car🚔🚨... Here is Antti's latest creation...🎨😊 The mask is transformed into a New York Fire Department truck🚒💦, it is a tribute to the heroes of the Resque 1 team👊🏻💪🏻. I just love to paint and create these Storyteller masks. Use the mask's surface to create the story🇺🇸📚. I can tell you this, I loved to paint this story😊🎨. #anttiraanta @nyrangers @nhl #DaveArt #nhl #DaveArtCreativity #nyfd @nyfd9_11 @bauergoalie
・・・
#Repost @davidofdaveart

@hank30nyr says it's time to get going! #NYR

#repost

caption:
#Repost @davidofdaveart of @hellberg45's mask
 
Today we have the pleasure to present Magnus Hellberg s new #NYR bucket.  

Magnus and I have been working together for many years. Magnus is from Uppsala in Sweden, from the same city comes a famous Swedish cat , the cute cartoon Peter-No-Tail. So on all Magnus masks Peter-No-Tail always pop up as a postcard from his home.  And now when Magnus signed with New York Rangers, of course Peter-No-Tail will also move to New York ... And since it is New York, Peter-No-Tail wanted to fit in so he dressed up to fit the city  The design is created as a clean cut Rangers design which breath New York Rangers in every detail . For sure it is loaded with all the DAVEART Trademark Super FX , and much more . The closer you come the more details you will discover , among them one of Peter-No-Tail s favorite buildings in Uppsala, the church with two towers .. It is so exciting to come up with new designs every day and create masks in totally different styles . Every mask is totally unique.

Thanks Magnus, I love to be your personal artist . Thank you all for your interest .
@hellberg45 @nyrangers @nhl #daveartthecradleofcreativity #daveart @davidofdaveart #nhl
caption_raw:
#Repost @davidofdaveart of @hellberg45's mask
・・・
Today we have the pleasure to present Magnus Hellberg´s new #NYR bucket. 🗽

Magnus and I have been working together for many years. Magnus is from Uppsala in Sweden, from the same city comes a famous Swedish cat😸, the cute cartoon Peter-No-Tail. So on all Magnus masks Peter-No-Tail always pop up as a postcard from his home.📬 And now when Magnus signed with New York Rangers, of course Peter-No-Tail will also move to New York🌃... And since it is New York, Peter-No-Tail wanted to fit in so he dressed up to fit the city🗽… The design is created as a clean cut Rangers design which breath New York Rangers in every detail🔎. For sure it is loaded with all the DAVEART Trademark Super FX🔎, and much more👊🏻. The closer you come the more details you will discover🔎, among them one of Peter-No-Tail´s favorite buildings in Uppsala, the church with two towers⛪️.. It is so exciting to come up with new designs every day and create masks in totally different styles🎨. Every mask is totally unique.

Thanks Magnus, I love to be your personal artist😊. Thank you all for your interest❤️.
@hellberg45 @nyrangers @nhl #daveartthecradleofcreativity #daveart @davidofdaveart #nhl

caption:
OFFICIAL: #NYR name Chris Drury as Director of Player Development. 
In his role, Drury, 39, will be responsible for working with the team s hockey operations department to assist in the development of Rangers prospects, both on and off the ice. He will serve as a liaison between the hockey operations department and prospects in the organization, and assist in the evaluation of the team s prospects. Drury will work closely with the Rangers  American Hockey League affiliate, the Hartford Wolf Pack, to further enhance the progression of Rangers prospects who are in professional hockey by providing encouragement and guidance. In addition, he will assist in overseeing and evaluating all players at the collegiate level.
caption_raw:
OFFICIAL: #NYR name Chris Drury as Director of Player Development. 
In his role, Drury, 39, will be responsible for working with the team’s hockey operations department to assist in the development of Rangers prospects, both on and off the ice. He will serve as a liaison between the hockey operations department and prospects in the organization, and assist in the evaluation of the team’s prospects. Drury will work closely with the Rangers’ American Hockey League affiliate, the Hartford Wolf Pack, to further enhance the progression of Rangers prospects who are in professional hockey by providing encouragement and guidance. In addition, he will assist in overseeing and evaluating all players at the collegiate level.

caption:
#NYR Dom Moore on Martin St. Louis:
 We ve been teammates for a few years and had some long playoff runs together. He s the best teammate I ve ever played with, without a doubt. It s easy to say that. Not taking anything away from all of the amazing players and people that I ve been fortunate enough to play with in my career, but Marty is one of a kind. He s as character of a guy as you ll ever meet, on and off the ice, and just kind of brought passion to his game every day (with) the way he approached it. I learned a lot from him, and (will) look back on playing with him as some of the best moments of my career.  (via Sportsnet 590)
caption_raw:
#NYR Dom Moore on Martin St. Louis:
“We’ve been teammates for a few years and had some long playoff runs together. He’s the best teammate I’ve ever played with, without a doubt. It’s easy to say that. Not taking anything away from all of the amazing players and people that I’ve been fortunate enough to play with in my career, but Marty is one of a kind. He’s as character of a guy as you’ll ever meet, on and off the ice, and just kind of brought passion to his game every day (with) the way he approached it. I learned a lot from him, and (will) look back on playing with him as some of the best moments of my career.” (via Sportsnet 590)
